serverTasks.title: Kanban Redesign: End-to-end cascade testing
Kimi K2 model testing
Alpha predictions tracking
BioCosm: THE_COSMOS_SPEC.md — full product spec
BioCosm: DESIGN.md — color system, typography, theme
BioCosm: CURSOR_PROMPT.md — Cursor AI coding instructions
BioCosm: Expand company DB to 265 companies
BioCosm: yfinance stock price pipeline (173 tickers)
BioCosm: OpenInsider cluster buy scraper
P1: Drug target extraction pipeline (ClinicalTrials.gov → drug_programs.json)
serverTasks.description: Query ClinicalTrials.gov API for Phase 1/2/3 oncology trials. Extract drug name, target protein, mechanism, sponsor, phase, NCT ID, indication. Output data/drug_programs.json. Target: 30-50 programs. Key targets: KRAS, PD-1/PDL1, HER2, EGFR, BRAF, CDK4/6, PARP, BCL-2, ADCs, CAR-T, bispecifics.

serverTasks.title: P1: Target database (data/targets.json — gene, UniProt ID, AlphaFold URL, disease assoc)
serverTasks.description: Create data/targets.json with: protein_name, gene_symbol, uniprot_id, alphafold_structure_url, disease_associations, drugs_targeting, unmet_need_level (red/yellow/green). Start with 20 oncology targets.

serverTasks.title: P1: OpenTargets integration — target validation scores
serverTasks.description: Build pipeline to query OpenTargets Platform API for target validation scores, disease associations, and drug-target mappings. Feeds into evidence score.

serverTasks.title: P1: AlphaFold structure fetcher (UniProt → PDB/mmCIF cache)
serverTasks.description: Fetch AlphaFold structures from EBI API. Gene symbol → UniProt ID → download PDB/mmCIF. Cache locally in data/structures/.

serverTasks.title: P1: Evidence score calculator (5-factor weighted composite)
serverTasks.description: Compute evidence score: Target Validation (25%), Clinical Progress (20%), Trial Design Quality (20% — placeholder for Nathan), Competitive Landscape (15%), Signal Strength (20%). Each factor 1-5, combined weighted out of 100.

serverTasks.title: P1: PostgreSQL schema design + initial data load
serverTasks.description: Design DB schema for: companies, drug_programs, targets, signals, relationships. Tables match data models in spec §6.3. Load initial oncology data (30-50 programs).

serverTasks.title: P1: SEC EDGAR Form 4 pipeline — biotech insider filings
serverTasks.description: Refine existing sec_edgar.py. Parse Form 4s specifically for biotech CIKs. Detect cluster buys (3+ insiders same company within 14 days). Output to signals table.

serverTasks.title: P1: FDA PDUFA calendar scraper
serverTasks.description: Build/refine pipeline to scrape FDA PDUFA dates and upcoming decisions. Feed into catalyst countdown system. Weekly refresh.

serverTasks.title: P1: Relationship mapper (same-target, same-company, dx↔tx cross-links)
serverTasks.description: Build relationship graph from drug_programs and targets data. Types: same_target, same_company, diagnostic_therapeutic, competitor. Strength score for constellation line thickness.

serverTasks.title: P1: Fix OpenInsider scraper HTML parsing
serverTasks.description: Current scraper may not match real HTML structure. Fetch actual page, inspect table structure, update parser. Test with real data.

serverTasks.title: P1 RESEARCH: ClinicalTrials.gov API docs — endpoints, params, response format
serverTasks.description: Read API docs at clinicaltrials.gov/data-api/about-api. Document correct endpoints for Phase 1/2/3 oncology trials, intervention details, sponsor info. Save to knowledge/tools/clinicaltrials-api.md.

serverTasks.title: P1 RESEARCH: AlphaFold/UniProt API — structure fetch workflow
serverTasks.description: Document gene symbol → UniProt ID → AlphaFold structure pipeline. API endpoints, file formats, caching strategy. Save to knowledge/tools/alphafold-api.md.

serverTasks.title: P1 RESEARCH: OpenTargets API — validation scores, disease associations
serverTasks.description: Document OpenTargets Platform API. How to get target validation, disease associations, drug-target mappings. Save to knowledge/tools/opentargets-api.md.

serverTasks.title: P1 RESEARCH: Create initial oncology target list (20 targets w/ UniProt IDs)
serverTasks.description: Research top 20 oncology drug targets. For each: gene_symbol, protein_name, uniprot_id, 1-sentence description, approved_drugs_count. Web search to verify UniProt IDs. Save to data/oncology_targets.json.

serverTasks.title: P3: Mol*/3Dmol.js integration — protein structure in side panel
serverTasks.description: Integrate Mol* or 3Dmol.js in the side panel. Interactive rotation. Highlight drug binding site. Caption: e.g. 'KRAS G12C with sotorasib bound in Switch II pocket'. This is the 'holy shit' moment.

serverTasks.title: P3: Binding site highlighting on protein structures
serverTasks.description: Highlight the specific drug binding site on each protein structure. Requires mapping drug → binding site residues. May need manual curation for initial 20 targets.

serverTasks.title: P3: Structure caching + lazy loading system
serverTasks.description: Cache protein structures locally. Lazy load on side panel open. Static image thumbnail in hover card, full 3D on click. Mobile: static image + 'View in 3D' button.

serverTasks.title: P4: AI science summaries for each target (3-4 sentences, PhD level)
serverTasks.description: Generate opinionated science summaries for each of 20 oncology targets. Not Wikipedia — PhD-level, accessible. Example: 'KRAS G12C is an oncogenic driver in ~13% of NSCLC. First covalent inhibitor approved 2021. Resistance mutations emerging.' Nathan reviews/edits.

serverTasks.title: P4: Nathan review/edit workflow for science content
serverTasks.description: Build a simple review queue. AI drafts science summaries + trial quality scores → Nathan approves/edits. Could be a simple admin page or markdown files Nathan edits directly.

serverTasks.title: P4: Competitor mapping per target (auto-generated from data)
serverTasks.description: For each target, list all companies developing drugs against it. Clickable links in side panel. Auto-generated from drug_programs data. Shows competitive landscape at a glance.

serverTasks.title: P4: Unmet need indicator per target (🔴🟡🟢)
serverTasks.description: Count approved therapies per indication from FDA Orange Book. 🔴 = none (first-in-class opportunity), 🟡 = 1-3, 🟢 = 4+ (crowded). Display on star + hover card + deep dive.

serverTasks.title: P5: Insider signal overlay (green flares/rings on stars)
serverTasks.description: When insider buying detected for a company, its star gets green glow ring. Pulse animation. Cluster buys = brighter glow. Historical insider buys marked on price chart in side panel.

serverTasks.title: P5: Catalyst countdown system (amber rings, days-until)
serverTasks.description: Stars with upcoming catalysts get amber ring. Pulse speed increases as date approaches. Countdown timer in hover card: '⏱ PDUFA — 14 days'. Feed from FDA calendar + clinical trial milestone dates.

serverTasks.title: P5: Daily digest overlay animation (what changed since yesterday)
serverTasks.description: First open each day → 5-second animation showing: new stars (trials filed), phase transitions, insider signals, catalysts < 7 days. 'Skip' button. Then full map.

serverTasks.title: P5: Phase transition detection pipeline
serverTasks.description: Compare yesterday's trial phases to today's. Detect when a drug advances Phase 1→2→3. Generate signal event. Animate star moving rightward on constellation.

serverTasks.title: P6: Discovery Mode — guided 'planetarium show' tour
serverTasks.description: Auto-navigating tour through interesting constellations. 'This week: KRAS just got crowded...' Auto-pans, zooms, highlights. Pause/exit anytime. Weekly narrative updates. Premium feature.

serverTasks.title: P6: Time Warp Mode — scrub through years of biotech evolution
serverTasks.description: Timeline scrubber at bottom. Play → watch 5 years in 30 seconds. Stars appear (new trials), move rightward (phase progression), explode (FDA approval), fade (failure). Manual scrub or auto-play.

serverTasks.title: P6: Sound design — subtle ambient interaction audio
serverTasks.description: Tone.js or Web Audio API. Soft tone on hover, deeper for high-evidence, chime for insider activity. Mutable, off by default on mobile. Telescope/sci-fi feel.

serverTasks.title: P6: Shareable snapshots (branded images for Twitter/X)
serverTasks.description: Click 'Share' → generate beautiful branded image of current view. Optimized for Twitter/X, LinkedIn. Each share = free marketing. Include constellation + key data + BioCosm branding.

serverTasks.title: P6: Nathan's Notes system ('N' badge on curated stars)
serverTasks.description: Small 'N' badge on stars where Nathan has written scientific commentary. Click → Nathan's opinionated analysis. 'This trial design is underpowered...' Paid users only. The PhD moat, personified.

serverTasks.title: P6: 'What If' simulator — toggle drug to approved, see ripple effects
serverTasks.description: Toggle a drug to 'approved' → watch constellation change. Which competitors fade? Which diagnostics become relevant? Makes interconnections tangible. Premium feature.

serverTasks.title: P7: Mobile responsive design (tap, bottom sheets, pinch-zoom)
serverTasks.description: Tap = hover card (bottom sheet). Swipe up = full deep dive. Protein = static image + 'View 3D' button. Everything stacked vertically. Pinch to zoom on constellation. Min touch target 44px.

serverTasks.title: P7: Performance optimization (60fps with 50+ stars)
serverTasks.description: Canvas rendering vs SVG for star count. Lazy load side panel content. Throttle force simulation. Profile and optimize render loop. Target: smooth 60fps with 50+ animated stars.

serverTasks.title: P7: Deploy to Vercel/Railway + Supabase (production)
serverTasks.description: Deploy Next.js to Vercel or Railway. PostgreSQL on Supabase. Cloudflare CDN. Domain: biocosm.io (check availability). CI/CD pipeline.

serverTasks.title: P7: Stripe payment integration (free/paid/premium tiers)
serverTasks.description: Stripe checkout + subscription management. Free tier: 50 companies, no scores/signals. Paid ($29-49/mo): full map, scores, signals, proteins. Premium ($99-149/mo): Nathan's Notes, What If, API, Discovery Mode.

serverTasks.title: P7: Free/paid tier gating + auth system
serverTasks.description: Authentication (NextAuth or Clerk). Gate features by subscription tier. Free users see limited map. Paid unlock full constellation + evidence scores + insider signals. Premium unlocks Nathan's Notes + simulator.

serverTasks.title: AUTO: Daily cron — ClinicalTrials.gov refresh (6 AM)
serverTasks.description: Daily cron at 6 AM ET: refresh clinical trial data from ClinicalTrials.gov API. Detect new trials, phase changes, completions.

serverTasks.title: AUTO: Daily cron — SEC EDGAR Form 4 scrape (7 AM)
serverTasks.description: Daily cron at 7 AM ET: scrape SEC EDGAR for new Form 4 insider filings for tracked biotech CIKs. Detect cluster buys.

serverTasks.title: AUTO: Daily cron — OpenInsider + prices + evidence recalc
serverTasks.description: 8 AM: OpenInsider scan. 4:30 PM: stock price update. 9 AM: evidence score recalculation. All automated, no human touch.

serverTasks.title: AUTO: Weekly cron — FDA calendar refresh (Monday 6 AM)
serverTasks.description: Weekly Monday 6 AM: refresh FDA PDUFA calendar. Update catalyst countdown timers for all tracked drugs.

Mission Control: Fix cross-origin dev warnings
P2A: Next.js project scaffold (App Router, TypeScript, Tailwind, design tokens)
serverTasks.description: Initialize Next.js 14+ with App Router, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS. Configure all design tokens from DESIGN.md (colors, typography, spacing). Set up project structure: components/, lib/, data/, types/. This is the foundation everything renders on.

serverTasks.title: P2A: API routes — serve programs, targets, signals, relationships as JSON
serverTasks.description: Next.js API routes: /api/programs, /api/targets, /api/signals, /api/relationships. Serve data from JSON files initially (migrate to DB later). TypeScript types matching spec §6.3 data models.

serverTasks.title: P2A: D3 force-directed constellation — layout engine + physics
serverTasks.description: The core visualization engine. D3 v7 force simulation: X-force pushes stars by clinical phase (L→R), Y-force clusters by biological target. Custom forces for organic constellation feel. NOT a rigid grid. Stars drift gently. This is the hardest single task — give it a full focused Cursor session.

serverTasks.title: P2A: Star rendering — 8 visual dimensions (size, color, brightness, pulse, ring)
serverTasks.description: Each star encodes 8 dimensions: X=phase, Y=target cluster, size=market cap, color=therapeutic area (spec §3.3), brightness/opacity=evidence score, pulse speed=catalyst proximity, green ring=insider activity, constellation lines=relationships. Canvas or SVG — profile both for 50+ stars at 60fps.

serverTasks.title: P2A: Background — deep space gradient, faint star-chart grid (~5% opacity)
serverTasks.description: Deep space background (#0F172A). Subtle radial gradient from center. Very faint grid overlay at ~5% opacity like astronomical star charts. Sets the premium feel for everything on top.

serverTasks.title: P2A: Constellation lines — relationship edges between stars
serverTasks.description: Draw relationship lines: same company = dotted, same target = faint arc, dx↔tx = cross-link. Line thickness = relationship strength. Lines are dim by default, illuminate when either star is hovered. This creates the constellation patterns.

serverTasks.title: P2B: Hover interaction — star grows, lines illuminate, unrelated dims
serverTasks.description: On hover (0.5s): star scales 1.2x, constellation lines from this star illuminate, nearby competitors get subtle outline, everything unrelated dims to 20% opacity. Smooth transitions. This is where the map becomes alive.

serverTasks.title: P2B: Compact hover card (drug, company, target, phase dots, evidence, price, catalyst)
serverTasks.description: Floating card on hover. Contents: drug name + company, target protein, phase dots (● ● ● ○), evidence bar with score, price + daily %, market cap, catalyst countdown (if any), insider badge (if any). Compact — no wall of text. See spec §4.1 for exact layout.

serverTasks.title: P2B: Side panel deep dive — slides in from right on click
serverTasks.description: Click star → side panel slides from right. Map shifts left but stays visible. Contents top→bottom: header, 3D protein placeholder, science summary, evidence breakdown (5 bars), competitors list (clickable), drug timeline, 6-month price sparkline. Spec §4.2.

serverTasks.title: P2B: Interactive legend + filter controls (left sidebar)
serverTasks.description: Left side legend: click therapeutic area to toggle isolate/dim. Shows star count per area. Filter controls: min market cap slider, phase filter checkboxes, insider activity toggle, catalyst < 30d toggle, search box (ticker or company). Spec §4.4.

serverTasks.title: P2B: Price sparkline chart in side panel (6mo, insider dates marked)
serverTasks.description: Small 6-month price chart in side panel deep dive. Plotly or Recharts sparkline. Mark insider buy dates as green dots on chart. Mark phase transition dates. Clean, minimal, informative.
